original: @139b # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @139b # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: de wi dha ra pra bh'a aa dhishth'a na /
analyzed: de wi dha ra pra bh'a aa dhishth'a na /
translated: Devi-dhara-prabha-adhisthana

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:🔽The Blessing of the Goddess Light Holder

original: lha mo 'od 'dzin ma'i byin gyis brlab pa bcom ldan 'das gti mug dga' ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: lha mo 'od 'dzin ma'i byin gyis brlab pa bcom ldan 'das gti mug dga' ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Bhagavati Mohapriya.

original: ma lus srid pa'i gti mug rnams //
analyzed: ma lus srid pa'i gti mug rnams //
translated: All the delusions of the entire world

original: mthar byed ma la rab btud nas //
analyzed: mthar byed ma la rab btud nas //
translated: I bow to the one who brings them to an end.🔽I will explain the blessing of meditative concentration

original: spros med bdud rtsi za ba yi //🔽ting nge 'dzin gyis byin brlab bshad //
analyzed: spros med bdud rtsi za ba yi // ting nge 'dzin gyis byin brlab bshad //
translated: Of the unelaborate nectar consumer.

original: mandala la sogs lta gon te //
analyzed: mandala la sogs lta gon te //
translated: Having prepared the mandala and so forth,🔽The self-visualization, recitation, offering torma,

original: bdag bskyed bzlas pa mchod gtor dang // 'khor lo tshogs kyis mnyes byas la //
analyzed: bdag bskyed bzlas pa mchod gtor dang // 'khor lo tshogs kyis mnyes byas la //
translated: And pleasing the wheel with the feast,

original: yon bcas dang pa'i slob ma la //
analyzed: yon bcas dang pa'i slob ma la //
translated: To the faithful disciple with offerings,🔽Give the vows and establish them in the commitments.

original: sdom pa byin la dam la gzhag / de nas 'dun pa drag po yis //
analyzed: sdom pa byin la dam la gzhag / de nas 'dun pa drag po yis //
translated: Then, with intense aspiration,

original: bla ma la ni gsol ba gdab //
analyzed: bla ma la ni gsol ba gdab //
translated: Make requests to the guru.

original: padma'i dbus gnas zla ba la //
analyzed: padma'i dbus gnas zla ba la //
translated: In the center of a lotus and moon,

original: aom skyes lha mo mnyam bzhengs dkar //
analyzed: aom skyes lha mo mnyam bzhengs dkar //
translated: The goddess born from Om stands upright and is white,

original: chu shel gri gug padma'i snod //
analyzed: chu shel gri gug padma'i snod //
translated: Holding a crystal curved knife and a lotus vessel,

original: thugs kar 'dzin pa rgyan gyis brgyan //
analyzed: thugs kar 'dzin pa rgyan gyis brgyan //
translated: Grasping at the heart, adorned with ornaments.

original: 'od dkar 'phro 'du shel lta bu //
analyzed: 'od dkar 'phro 'du shel lta bu //
translated: White light radiates and reabsorbs, like crystal.

original: de lta'i gnyis ka gsal byas nas //
analyzed: de lta'i gnyis ka gsal byas nas //
translated: Having thus clarified both,

original: bla ma'i snying gar @140a * //
analyzed: bla ma'i snying gar @140a * //
translated: the goddess emerges from the guru’s heart

original: ji bzhin gyi //
analyzed: ji bzhin gyi //
translated: just as before🔽and enters your heart.

original: lha mo 'thon te snying gar gzhug / de yi brang dkyil aom skyes pa //
analyzed: lha mo 'thon te snying gar gzhug / de yi brang dkyil aom skyes pa //
translated: In the center of her chest is an oṃ,

original: gri gug aas mtshan thod nang du //
analyzed: gri gug aas mtshan thod nang du //
translated: which becomes a flaying knife marked with an a, inside a skull cup,

original: phyed nub tsam du bsam par bya //🔽de yi 'od kyis khams gsum gyi //
analyzed: phyed nub tsam du bsam par bya // de yi 'od kyis khams gsum gyi //
translated: imagined to be half full.🔽Her light severs all the bonds

original: gnyis 'dzin 'khri ba kun bcad do //
analyzed: gnyis 'dzin 'khri ba kun bcad do //
translated: of dualistic grasping in the three realms.

original: bdag med shes rab dam pa yis //
analyzed: bdag med shes rab dam pa yis //
translated: With the sublime wisdom of selflessness,

original: sangs rgyas mchod de de rnams kyis //
analyzed: sangs rgyas mchod de de rnams kyis //
translated: offerings are made to the buddhas,

original: stong nyid ye shes bkug la bstim //🔽thod pa'i 'od kyis srid gsum gyi //
analyzed: stong nyid ye shes bkug la bstim // thod pa'i 'od kyis srid gsum gyi //
translated: and their wisdom of emptiness is summoned and dissolves.🔽The light from the skull cup clears away all

original: 'dzin pa'i du:kha kun bsal te //
analyzed: 'dzin pa'i du:kha kun bsal te //
translated: the stains of grasping in the three worlds

original: zag med bde par gshegs pa mchod //
analyzed: zag med bde par gshegs pa mchod //
translated: and makes offerings to the sugatas of uncontaminated bliss.🔽The supreme wisdom of nonconceptual great bliss

original: mi rtog bde chen ye shes mchog / bkug la gnyis su med par bya //
analyzed: mi rtog bde chen ye shes mchog / bkug la gnyis su med par bya //
translated: is summoned and made nondual.🔽The wondrous union of the buddhas’ wisdom

original: sangs rgyas rnams kyi bde stong gi / ye shes zung 'jug rmad byung gis //🔽bdud rtsis lus gang brtan g-yo yi //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rnams kyi bde stong gi / ye shes zung 'jug rmad byung gis // bdud rtsis lus gang brtan g-yo yi //
translated: of bliss and emptiness🔽fills the body with nectar.🔽The essence of the animate and inanimate

original: bcud bsdus ngo bor bsam byas la //
analyzed: bcud bsdus ngo bor bsam byas la //
translated: is imagined to be gathered.

original: bla ma'i ting 'dzin nus pas dbab //🔽aom hr'i:shtri:wi kri t'a na na h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
analyzed: bla ma'i ting 'dzin nus pas dbab // aom hr'i:shtri:wi kri t'a na na h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
translated: The guru's power of concentration causes it to descend.🔽Om hriḥ śrī vīkṛtānana hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ svāhā.

original: aa mo ha ra ti a'a gatstsha ya a'a gatstsha ya h'um h'um dza dza dza ya /
analyzed: aa mo ha ra ti a'a gatstsha ya a'a gatstsha ya h'um h'um dza dza dza ya /
translated: Amogharatī āgacchāyāgacchā hūṃ hūṃ ja ja ja ya.

original: aa a'a / ai a'i /
analyzed: aa a'a / ai a'i /
translated: A ā / i ī.🔽🔽

original: au a'u / ri r'i /
analyzed: au a'u / ri r'i /
translated: U ū. Ri rī.

original: li l'i / ae aee /
analyzed: li l'i / ae aee /
translated: Li lī. Ai ai.

original: ao aoo / aam aa:/
analyzed: ao aoo / aam aa:/
translated: O au. Aṃ aḥ.🔽Shaking, itching, and laughter

original: 'phar dang g-ya' dang dgod pa dang // bde stong nyams ni skye bar 'gyur //
analyzed: 'phar dang g-ya' dang dgod pa dang // bde stong nyams ni skye bar 'gyur //
translated: and the experience of bliss and emptiness will arise.

original: ji srid bran du khas blangs nas //
analyzed: ji srid bran du khas blangs nas //
translated: As long as one has accepted servitude

original: yon phul mnyes pas dam tshig bzhin //
analyzed: yon phul mnyes pas dam tshig bzhin //
translated: and offered a gift, one should please the guru in accordance with the commitments.

original: bla ma bsten la brtson par bya //
analyzed: bla ma bsten la brtson par bya //
translated: One should strive to rely on the guru.🔽The disciple who desires spiritual powers

original: bla ma blo mi bde ba yi //🔽slob ma'i dngos grub 'dod pa ni //
analyzed: bla ma blo mi bde ba yi // slob ma'i dngos grub 'dod pa ni //
translated: from a guru whose mind is unhappy

original: chur shes smig rgyu ji bzhin no //
analyzed: chur shes smig rgyu ji bzhin no //
translated: is like one who desires water from a mirage.

original: ting nge 'dzin gyi bcud len gyi byin rlabs grub thob kyi bdag po mkhas pa chen po dpal 'dzin gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gyi bcud len gyi byin rlabs grub thob kyi bdag po mkhas pa chen po dpal 'dzin gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
translated: The blessing of the elixir of meditative concentration composed by the great scholar Śrīdhara, the lord of siddhas, is complete.

original: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po de ba a'a ka ra dang / lo ts'a ba rin chen bzang pos bsgyur ba las /
analyzed: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po de ba a'a ka ra dang / lo ts'a ba rin chen bzang pos bsgyur ba las /
translated: Translated by the Indian abbot Deva-akara and the translator Rin-chen-zang-po.

original: dus phyis rgya gar shar phyogs kyi pandi ta darba na a'a ts'arya dang lo ts'a ba dge slong rdo rje 'dzin pa zhe sdang rdo rjes bsgyur cing zhus te slar dag par byas so //
analyzed: dus phyis rgya gar shar phyogs kyi pandi ta darba na a'a ts'arya dang lo ts'a ba dge slong rdo rje 'dzin pa zhe sdang rdo rjes bsgyur cing zhus te slar dag par byas so //
translated: Later, the Indian pandit Darvabhiksu and the translator-monk Dorje-dzin-she-dhang-ngai translated and revised it.

original: snga 'gyur la 'di bas tshan che tsam gda'o gsung ngo//
analyzed: snga 'gyur la 'di bas tshan che tsam gda'o gsung ngo//
translated: It is said that the earlier translation is more extensive.
